description:
A friend of mine met Rusty on a local campus where he's a sophomore. He hasn't decided on a major yet, but he's on the swim team and I bet he looks great in a Speedo!
It's funny that he's a swimmer because he's the spitting image of a young Greg Louganis. He just turned 21, but instead of chasing girls his own age he likes to focus on "MILFs" (Mothers I'd Like to Fuck). He says that women over 30 really do it for him as they are more experienced.
Rusty has a really cute personality, a great smile, and an awesome body. I'm hoping he will come back for more!
title: Rusty
